name: Reiko Sudo
biography: Reiko Sudo (b. 1953) is one of Japan’s most important contemporary textile designers. Educated at Musashino Art University, she and Junichi Arai in 1984 co-founded the Japanese company and store, Nuno, which produces textiles of extraordinary ingenuity and beauty. Sudo and the other designers at Nuno combine tradition and advanced technologies with remarkable creativity, which, over the last 20 years, has lead them to the forefront of textile design.
